pages.text: Store the specified item in a container located at the provided coordinates. If the coordinates do not point to a container (anymore), the task becomes invalid. If the robot does not have a matching itemstack in its inventory, the task becomes invalid. If the container is full, the task becomes invalid $(bold)for a time$(), after which the robot will return to the container and re-check it for any space.
You can use this in conjunction with $(italic)retrieve$() to transport items between containers.
